name: nyc-redfin-undervalued-property-finder
description: AI-powered tool to find undervalued properties in NYC using Redfin's hidden API endpoints and market analysis

scripts.find-manhattan: node -e "const finder = require('./undervalued-property-finder.js'); const f = new finder(); f.findUndervaluedProperties('Manhattan, NY', {maxPrice: 2500000}).then(r => console.log('Found', r.undervaluedCount, 'deals'))"
scripts.find-brooklyn: node -e "const finder = require('./undervalued-property-finder.js'); const f = new finder(); f.findUndervaluedProperties('Brooklyn, NY', {maxPrice: 1500000}).then(r => console.log('Found', r.undervaluedCount, 'deals'))"
scripts.find-queens: node -e "const finder = require('./undervalued-property-finder.js'); const f = new finder(); f.findUndervaluedProperties('Queens, NY', {maxPrice: 1200000}).then(r => console.log('Found', r.undervaluedCount, 'deals'))"
scripts.lint: eslint *.js || echo 'ESLint not configured - install with: npm install --save-dev eslint'

author: Your Name
